Name: Flare
Author: JCT - jct@flare.systems}
Description: [Flare](https://flare.systems) automatically identifies your company's digital assets made publicly available due to human error or malicious attacks.
WorkbookDescription: This Workbook gives you a breakdown of data ingested from Flare by source, type and criticality.
PlaybookDescription: Playbook enables to send an email to user found in leaked credentials.
